focusrangefromlens: [W]: Approx. 1 ft. 8 in. (50 cm) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 2 ft. 8 in. (80cm) to infinity, Macro close-up mode: Approx. 0.8 in (2 cm) to infinity (wide-angle position)
weight: Approx. 14 oz (395 g) (including battery and SD memory card)
imagesensor: 1/1.7-in. type CCD, approx. 10.39 total million pixels
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL14 (supplied) AC Adapter EH-5b (used in combination with the Power Connector EP-5A both available separately)
lens: 7.1x optical zoom, NIKKOR lens; 6.0-42.6mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 28-200 mm lens in 35mm format); f/2.8-5.6, Digital Zoom: up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 800 mm lens in 35mm format)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 4.6 x 3.1 x 1.9 in. (116.3 x 76.9 x 48.0 mm) (excluding projections)
storagemedia: Internal memory (approx. 94 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap AN-CP21, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL14, Battery Charger MH-24, USB Cable UC-E6, Audio Video Cable EG-CP16, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM
isosensitivity: ISO 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200, Hi 1 (equivalent to 6400) Auto (auto gain from ISO 100 to 800) High ISO sensitivity auto (ISO 100 to 1600) Fixed range auto (ISO 100 to 200, 100 to 400) Low noise night mode (ISO 400 to 12800)
monitor: 3.0-inch (7.5 cm), approx. 921k-dot, wide viewing angle TFT LCD monitor with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment, tiltable approx. 81 degrees downward, approx. 105 degrees upward
